description.value: You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts. At the end of a successful Daring Act, you can make a melee Strike against the target or attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] the target. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] against the Strike you make during Daring Act as well as the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.
